chunking_strategy.rationale: Header sections chunked by semantic category (7 chunks). ODBC_Exec (2,212 lines) sub-chunked into 8 phases by execution flow. Helper functions chunked individually (10 chunks).

quality_metrics.gap_description: Gap lines are blank lines, comment separators, and #endif guards between chunks — no functional code is missed
quality_metrics.chunks_below_minimum: 7 (all header sections — justified by semantic distinctness)
